The concept of time travel would become a reality, allowing people to explore the past and future.
Time travel could be used for education, allowing students to learn about historical events firsthand.
Time travel could be used for entertainment, such as in movies and video games.
Time travel could have legal and ethical implications, as it raises questions about changing the past and the consequences of doing so.
Time travel could have implications for personal growth, as it allows individuals to learn from past mistakes and experiences.
